Class WechatConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.wechat.WechatConnector

  • @Connector(name="wechat",
           friendlyName="Wechat",
           minMuleVersion="3.8.0")
 @MetaDataScope(value=DataSenseResolver.class)
 @RequiresEnterpriseLicense(allowEval=true)
public class WechatConnector
extends Object

                                    String uri)

        http://admin.wechat.com/wiki/index.php?title=Getting_Started#Step_2._Verify_validity_of_the_URL

        uri - URI sent by WeChat Official Account Admin System

        description - Music description
        musicUrl - Music URL
